it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller

Class StandardControllerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller.StandardControllerFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControllerFactory

    public class StandardControllerFactory
extends Object
implements ControllerFactory
    Default implementation of controller factory
    Author:
    Alessandro Fulgini

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StandardControllerFactory(Match match, Map<String,PersistentView> views)
      Creates a factory associated to the given match and views of the players, which will be injected as dependencies where needed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AbstractEffect createEffectController(AbstractWeapon weapon, org.json.JSONObject config)
      Creates the controller for a specific weapon effect The controller will be set up with all the needed targets, so it's ready to use.
      GrabActionController createGrabActionController(PersistentView view)
      Creates the controller for a single Grab basic action
      MatchController createMatchController()
      Creates the controller for the match of this factory
      MoveActionController createMoveActionController()
      Creates the controller for the Move basic action
      PaymentHandler createPaymentHandler()
      Returns the payment handler for this match
      PowerupController createPowerupController(PowerupEnum type)
      Creates the controller for a specific powerup effect
      ReloadActionController createReloadActionController()
      Creates the controller for the Reload basic action
      ScoreManager createScoreManager()
      Returns the score manager for this match
      ShootActionController createShootActionController()
      Creates the controller for the Shoot basic action
      SpawnController createSpawnController()
      Creates the spawn controller associated to the match of this factory
      AbstractTarget createTargetController(AbstractWeapon weapon, org.json.JSONObject config)
      Creates the controller for a specific weapon target The required configuration fields are id and targetMode, the other ones will receive default values if not specified in the JSON.
      TurnController createTurnController(PlayerTurn turn)
      Creates a new controller for the turn of the match.
      AbstractWeapon createWeaponController(WeaponCard weaponCard)
      Creates the controller for a specific weapon The controller will be set up with all the effects and their targets, so it's ready to use.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StandardControllerFactory

        public StandardControllerFactory(Match match,
                                 Map<String,PersistentView> views)
        Creates a factory associated to the given match and views of the players, which will be injected as dependencies where needed.
        Parameters:
        match - the match to be controlled, not null
        views - the persistent views of the players, not null

      • createWeaponController

        public AbstractWeapon createWeaponController(WeaponCard weaponCard)
        Creates the controller for a specific weapon

        The controller will be set up with all the effects and their targets, so it's ready to use.

        Specified by:
        createWeaponController in interface ControllerFactory
        Parameters:
        weaponCard - The card of the weapon to be controlled, not null
        Returns:
        The controller for the weapon
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - if there is a problem with the JSON configuration

      • createEffectController

        public AbstractEffect createEffectController(AbstractWeapon weapon,
                                             org.json.JSONObject config)
        Creates the controller for a specific weapon effect

        The controller will be set up with all the needed targets, so it's ready to use.

        The required configuration fields are id and type, the other ones will receive default values if not specified in the JSON.

        It's advisable to validate the JSON before calling this method.

        Specified by:
        createEffectController in interface ControllerFactory
        Parameters:
        weapon - The weapon this effect belongs to, not null
        config - A JSON tree with the configuration of the effect, not null
        Returns:
        The effect controller
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - if the JSON does not conform to the specific

      • createTargetController

        public AbstractTarget createTargetController(AbstractWeapon weapon,
                                             org.json.JSONObject config)
        Creates the controller for a specific weapon target

        The required configuration fields are id and targetMode, the other ones will receive default values if not specified in the JSON.

        It's advisable to validate the JSON before calling this method.

        Specified by:
        createTargetController in interface ControllerFactory
        Parameters:
        weapon - The weapon this target belongs to, not null
        config - A JSON tree with the configuration of the target, not null
        Returns:
        The target controller
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - if the JSON does not conform to the specific
